chapter.title: Usage
chapter.para:
The basic form for invoking the CLI is the following:
# ./codex.php [program options] [module name] [function name] [function parameters]
Program options:
-v : Verbose. Give a detailed output of whatâ€™s going on.
-h: Help. Display help on how to use the program.
Module name: A "module" is a grouping of functions that act over a specific part of the CodeX system. Currently, the following modules are available:
(none): If the module is empty, system-wide functions are accesible (i.e., login to the server)
tracker: Tracker management module
Function name: The name of the function to invoke depends on the module being called. For details, see .
Function parameters: The parameters also depend on the function being called. See .

para.note: NOTE: the accentuated letters are not supported in the CLI.
